title: How do we get there (mitigation)?
description: You can explore here: the means of mitigation to achieve a well below two degree target: fossil phase out, ramp up of low-carbon technologies, the role of carbon sequestration. In detail we look at the transformation of one of the largest emitting sources - electricity production and at the regional detail of fossil phase out and low-carbon ramp up. All these parameters can be explored with full or reduced availibility of carbon dioxide removal (CDR) technologies.
